Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and elected to field first in the match.
The match was the first T20I encounter between India and England on Australian soil.
India had finished top of Group 2 with 8 points and a net run rate of 1.319, while England was second in Group 1 with 7 points and a net run rate of 0.473.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India and England have faced each other 22 times in T20I matches, with India winning 12 and England winning 10.
The match was held at the Adelaide Oval, and the weather conditions were favorable at the time of the toss.
